title: Cash Dividend On The Way From FedEx (FDX) - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel , on 9/6/19, FedEx Corp (Symbol: FDX) will trade ex-dividend, for its quarterly dividend of $0.65, payable on 10/1/19. As a percentage of FDX's recent stock price of $155.37, this dividend works out to approximately 0.42%.
